name: Triangle of Love
description: Love is made up of three unconditional properties in equal measure:  1. Acceptance 2. Understanding 3. Appreciation  Remove any one of the three and the triangle falls apart.  Which, by the way, is something highly inadvisable. Think about it — do you really want to live in a world of only two dimensions?  So, for the love of a triangle, please keep love whole.” ― Vera Nazarian, The Perpetual Calendar of Inspiration
